Articles.Content:
I'm not a big fan of god games but by god this looks amazing! Check it out!

http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/crytivogames/the-universim?ref=discovery

Look out Will Wright and Peter Molyneux. If this game delivers it could be the one to curb stomp your *****!

Already Greenlit on Steam...

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=250998536

Rock, Paper, Shotgun...

http://www.rockpapershotgun.com/2014/04/25/the-universim-god-game-spore-civilization/

Kotaku...

http://kotaku.com/the-universim-looks-like-everything-i-want-from-a-god-g-1568746671

I went ahead and pledged $20. Here's wishing these guys the best.

Oh I nearly forgot. Here is their homepage...

http://theuniversim.com/

Edited May 4, 2014 by Landge
I'm planning on donating to that kickstarter, really just to get access to early beta.

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/crytivogames/the-universim This game has 6 days to make it. 6 Days 60 K. Please, post this on all the different forums you can. Please! I realize spam might not be the best idea, but how else is this going to happen? And, any forum staff who sees this... I realize this thread should not be here, but for the love of whatever god you believe in let it stay
Merged into the existing thread about this game.

snip-I realize this thread should not be here, but for the love of whatever god you believe in let it stay
Merged into the existing thread about this game.

Odin was not pleased.
Oh my god that trailer is awesome gimme gimme please.
Made me drop my jaw to the floor. Truly something amazing. Only if it'd be ALL randomnly generated.
